title: Data Engineer Engineer (Campus, 2024)
purpose: To build cloud-based solutions for enterprise data pipelines on AWS and/or Azure using the latest technologies.
duties_responsibilities: Build cloud-based solutions for enterprise data pipelines on AWS and/or Azure using technologies such as Cloudera/Hadoop, Databricks, Synapse, Hive, and Spark.
Develop skills in collaboration, requirements gathering, testing, managing ambiguity in a fast-paced environment, and influencing outcomes.
Lead end-to-end delivery of select features in the data platforms.
Participate in an engaging cohort experience focused on learning, development, and networking at Capital Group.
required_qualifications: Currently pursuing a bachelor's degree with a major or minor in Computer Science, Engineering, Math, Statistics, cognitive science, or equivalent.
Practical experience with SQL, Python, Alteryx, and/or reporting/visualization tools like Tableau or PowerBI.
Passion for data and its possibilities, along with analytical and logical/critical thinking skills.
Basic understanding of SDLC and agile methodologies.
Effective expression of ideas and professional interaction with others.
Continuous learning mindset and comfort with new technologies.
Solution-driven mindset, accountability for results, and ability to communicate thought processes.
Highly collaborative and willing to share perspectives.
